snippet.title: Dustwind - The Last Resort | Console Announcement Teaser | PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S
snippet.description:
Dustwind – The Last Resort is coming to consoles!

Dustwind is a post-apocalyptical realtime tactic action game. The Last Resort is the single player experience of Dustwind with new controls and reworked UI for a great console experience.

GAME GENRE: 
Real-time tactics

SHORT DESCRIPTION
After the apocalypse the civilization as we know it has come to an end and the few people left alive have to fight each other in order to survive. These are hard times in the wasteland! You are the nameless heroine! A vicious assault has hit you hard. Without your memory and hopelessly outnumbered you go on a crusade, fighting your through your tormentors in order to take revenge. If you don't act carefully and clever, you won't stand a chance! During this adventure, it will occur to you that it’s not only your own fate that is on the stake but much, much more.

DUSTWIND - The Last Resort includes:
-    An exciting single player story mode.
-    Take over the role of the nameless HEROINE trying to survive in the wasteland!
-    16 Story missions
-    Skirmish: A great variety of exciting game modes awaits you.

PLATFORM: PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S

Get original Dustwind for PC on Steam here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/600460/Dustwind/
